channel.title: What do you like about the Gauntlet Forums?
channel.description: I just wanted to say that I really like the forum design and functionality. A lot of care has gone into making this. I'm really impressed.

item.title: What do you like about the Gauntlet Forums?
item.dc:creator: @Jesseabe
item.description:
@Jesseabe wrote:

This is a dark mode: Go into your profile to the preferences menu. On the left side there will be a list of sub menus. Click on “interface.” There is a themes toggle, one of the options is dark.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you like about the Gauntlet Forums?
item.dc:creator: @Kiltia
item.description:
@Kiltia wrote:

I absolutely agree – the clean design is really great (I do wish there was a dark mode, but that’s a personal preference).

The thing I enjoy most, though, is the kind of community the Gauntlet is trying to foster here. It’s a far more constructive and methodical community than some forums can end up being and I appreciate that a lot.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like about the Gauntlet Forums?
